newsitem.title: GERMANY: RWE - "slight increase" in Q1 96/97 earnings.
newsitem.headline: RWE - "slight increase" in Q1 96/97 earnings.

text.p: German diversified utility RWE AG said on Tuesday it had seen a "slight increase" in first-quarter of its 1996/97 business year.
Wolfgang Ziemann, RWE's chief financial officer, said at the group's annual results conference: "The trend is showing a slight plus" in the three months to the end of September 1996.
Ziemann gave no further details of earnings nor would he say what the first quarter trend meant for the whole year.
RWE's management board chairman Dietmar Kuhnt said full-year earnings in 1996/97 would be "slightly better" than in 1995/96. "The first quarter went well," Kuhnt said.
